attributes.action: DO SOMETHING ABOUT CLIMATE CHANGE BEFORE WE ALL DIE. Please.
attributes.additional_details: I am 15 years old and I don’t see the point in going to school if soon I will be dead. You may think this is being over dramatic. But I and many others are scared for their future. If we do not act this could really be the end. Please make drastic changes in our society to SAVE OUR SOULS.
attributes.background: If we don’t do about climate change very soon. Sea levels will rise. Disease will spread. Animals vital to the worlds ecosystem will die. And that is just the beginning. I’m calling to the uk government to be the first to make the the big changes necessary to save our planet.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about climate change, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might like to sign one of these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/268785
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/245708
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/259051
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/258464
